channel.title: A flag with Somecookie
channel.description: Recent content on A flag with Somecookie

item.title: DailyBugle
item.description: Daily Bugle - Compromise a Joomla CMS account via SQLi, practice cracking hashes and escalate your privileges by taking advantage of yum.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi there I am a student in cyber security in his early twenties who one day, trying to find out in what he was interested, stumbled across the concept of captures the flags. It was not the first time I had heard about this concept, but it was the first I decided to try to solve one by myself. After a few hours struggling I finally found my first flag…what a feeling!

item.title: Dogcat
item.description: Dogcat - I made a website where you can look at pictures of dogs and/or cats!
